frameworkDetection.playwright: Web tests, homepage, search, Orders Hub

scrollPatterns.banner: No scroll needed (at top of page)

patterns.then: expect.soft(await homePage.isOrderAgainSwimlaneVisible(), 'Order Again swimlane is visible').toBeTruthy();
